If January 1, May 30, July 4 or December 25 should fall on
Sunday, the following Monday will be considered a paid holiday.
If these four dates should fall on Saturday, there will be no
recognized paid holiday.
If duties require an employee to work on one of these holidays,
he may then take equivalent time off at a later, mutually agreed
upon time.'
Overtime
Employees of the NAE3 will not be entitled to receive pay for
overtime work. All employees receiving three weeks and one
month vacations are considered "Administrative" employees and
thus are expected to work whatever hours are required for the
proper performance of their duties. So far as other employees
are concerned, the procedure will be to provide compensatory
time off for any overtime worked.
Disability Leave
Disability leave accumulates at the rate of one working day
with pay for each month service (up to an accumulated credit
of 45 days) and is available each month to be used as necessary.
Any employee who has accrued a credit of 45 days shall receive
credit for only one-half day per month thereafter.
Leave for Death or Illness of Relatives
Leave of absence, with pay, on account of the funeral or death
of a relative, is approved without prior reauest provided such
privilege is not abused. Up to three days leave with pay may
be provided at the death of a member of the immediate family.
Up to one day of leave with pay is granted for attending the
funeral of a relative outside the immediate household or
family.
"Members of the immediate family" is interpreted to mean either
